member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas
member.summary: This namespace defines the main Windows Canvas API for drawing 2D graphics.

member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.DirectX
member.summary: This namespace defines DirectX types used for interop with other components.

member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.DirectX.Direct3D11
member.summary: This namespace defines Direct3D11 types used for interop with other components.

member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics
member.summary: This namespace defines Windows Runtime vector and matrix types. These are only used for data exchange, and do not include any methods for doing math with the values. For more complete functionality, see the namespace.
